The picture is already teased after completing the first three levels, but with some black blocks covering parts. Only when the boss is defeated is the picture revealed in full. At the start of the game the player chooses between Boys mode or Girls mode to determine the gender of the people in the pictures.

name: Glizzy Gobbler
summary: Made for meat-lovers! Roll, devour and grow your glizzy to take your revenge on the humans who have eaten your kind. Unlock skills and achievements along your path to human destruction. But be careful - the dogs are on the hunt!

name: Glory of the Colosseum
summary: Glory of the Colosseum is a turn-based tactical strategy game set across the Roman empire. A fresh take on tactical turn based combat with minimal randomness and maximum choice. Shape gladiators from fresh recruits to legends of the arena. Will you make it to the Colosseum and win eternal glory?

name: Gloom: Unhappy Homes
summary: Home is where the heart is buried beneath the floorboards. New cards, new rules, and a new family in this deadly expansion! Make everyone suffer even more.

name: Glorious
summary: Forge your Glorious Legacy in blood and bronze, in this roguelike action strategy game. The ancient world has been plunged into chaos and despair as the dark shadow of war looms over the land. Raise your army, summon your heroes, customise and command them to victory!

name: Gloriana
summary:
Gloriana. is a management game set in the year 1550 AD, when Elisabeth becomes Queen of England.

The player is cast as the owner of a small trading company with the goal to gain wealth and influence, through the international trading of goods and accumulation of luxury items, until they achieve sufficient status to be granted the post of counselor to the Queen. The player has time until the year 1588 to achieve this esteemed position, at which point the Spanish Armada attacks England and the game ends.

name: Glisten to Your Heart: The Courage Within You
summary: An emotional story-driven episodic game about magical beings who live above the clouds and whose purpose is to help us learn to express virtues like courage or friendship. On "the courage within you", you'll change the life of a shy courage Virtue who wants to prove she can be a great Virtue too

name: Gladiator's Glory: Salvation
summary: Fight for your glory and earn your freedom! Immersive gladiator fighting experience awaits. Upgrade your items and climb the tournament ladder by fighting against the mightiest gladiators. Defeating a Tournament Champion is not easy in this town!

name: Glory
summary: Glory is an RTS/Simulation game set in the Medieval period. Command your army in combat and battles to defeat your enemy and achieve victory. For Glory!

name: Glass
summary: Bring together desires that are scattered into bits and pieces. And discover the secrets of the 'World of Glass'.

name: Glass Hime to Kagami no Juusha
summary:
Royal Sand Lyon Academy.

The main character, Shunsuke Takida, entered the retinue department in order to fulfill a certain promise.

In the retinue department, there is an extracurricular activity to accompany and take care of the students of the royal department, and take care of various princesses ....

Shunsuke, who had a problem on the day of the entrance ceremony, was in danger of repeating a grade in just half a year.

With the help of many, Shunsuke aims to become a full-fledged servant.

name: Glass Hime to Kagami no Juusha: Limited Edition
summary:
The Complete Limited Edition includes:
- Glass Hime to Kagami no Juusha
- Acrylic ornament
- Official soundtrack / Vocal song CD
- Lycee Overture PR card

name: Gladiator of sparta
summary: A classic addictive/fun indie mini game for windows that you will play every time!. Do you ever wonder what is like to be in a realistic combat arena and how it feel? Play as Octavius , the greek warrior who is forced to fight in the gladiatorial arenas with many of the best soldiers in the empire..

name: Glow Stairs
summary: Tap right to move right, Tap left to move left as you try and climb the glow stairs. Grab 15 rubies and buy yourself a little time and boost your score. Fun arcade "Fall Up' Game

name: Glider: Soar the Skies
summary: Experience mobile flight simulation like never before. Glider features some of the most advanced graphics in mobile gaming. Soar over the hills of Switzerland and climb the ranks as you locate thermals in an attempt to stay aloft the longest. Fly along the edge of the hills and share the thermals with the eagles that inhabit the area. Observe detailed scenery as you become part of the world of glider pilots. Glider flying requires you to utilize the weather to your advantage as apposed to flying through it. Master the art of glider flying and soar for hundreds of miles without any fuel.

name: Gleylancer
summary: In the year 1992, Gleylancer was released as an iconic space shooter. Our heroine pilot decides to hijack the prototype fighter and go after her missing father. Get ready to shoot your way through battalions of hostile aliens as you guide your ship safely across the universe. Equip multiple weapons and powerups... Choose between different optional formations to customize your ship and become the most powerful fighting force in space.

name: Glorious Dawn
summary: Glorious Dawn is an engaging Sci-Fi game based on the cosmos you create and the stories you tell in it. In the most basic sense our game strives to be the Sci-Fi sandbox upon which you can build a universe of your own. Take command of a stellar civilization and shape an ever-changing galaxy to your liking. Form alliances, fight wars, study the darkest secrets of the universe, or just set out and explore the stars that hang suspended around you.

name: Glor.IO
summary: Survive and build your base, defending it from rivals. Fight for glory!

name: Glyphs of the Pharaohs
summary: A relaxing game of scrolls and tiles.

name: Glitch Dungeon
summary: Wield code-manipulating spells to traverse a corrupted labyrinth in this puzzle adventure platformer game.

name: Glitchhikers: First Drive
summary: A game about the liminal space of long drives.

name: Glow
summary: 2D puzzle platformer where light is a resource

name: Glass Walls
summary: Glass Walls is a 3D, 3rd-person puzzle game featuring a unique perspective switching mechanic, a surrealist visual style, an original soundtrack, and an intergenerational story about mothers and daughters. Playing as 3 generations of women, players swap between different perspectives to solve intricate puzzles and discover the stories behind each of them.

name: Global City
summary: Become the mayor and build the city of your dreams! In this game, anything is possible. Whatever you can imagine in a city-building and development simulator, you can do. Start from the very beginning and unlock new possibilities for developing your city in Global City!

name: Glass Cannons
summary: Local frenetic fighting game, dont get hit!

name: Glint
summary: Use the mirrors to avoid the deads and solve various enigmas to unlock doors and access the summit of the manor.

name: Glitch Dream
summary: Surrender to the dream.

name: Glyph Dentaku
summary: Operate the calculator with the 7-segment display to make the glyph indicated in the right-center.

name: Glory Hunters
summary: Glory Hunters is an innovative action-adventure RPG designed for the original GameBoy. It introduces a distinctive and original gameplay twist: progression is driven by earning achievements.

name: Glennhaven
summary: Low poly archery tower defense fantasy game

name: Gloom Reducer
summary: A wandering game with two endings.

name: Glitch
summary: Glitch is a 2D action platform inspired by the titles like Mega Man made by Gustavo for the "A Game By It's Cover 2016 Game Jam".

name: Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between
summary: Glitchhikers is a surreal journey through the spaces between places. A late night drive, a deserted airport lounge, a moonlit walk through an empty park, a quiet carriage on an overnight train. Who will you meet? What will you talk about? Where will the journey take you? Find yourself along the way.

name: Gladiatori
summary: Single player arena survivor. Earn ranks as you overcome your enemies to reach the top. Each enemy you kill is a step closer to your goal. Choose to spare or execute your foes as the rounds continue. For eternal glory, your rank is projected on the world stage.

name: Global Steel
summary: Global Steel is a 2d run-and-gun video game inspired by Saturday-morning cartoons from the 80s.

name: Gloomy Juncture
summary:
Gloomy Juncture is a neo-noir psychological thriller and a character-driven adventure with a core focus on point & click gameplay with challenging puzzles.

Set in the 90s, the story unfolds in a decaying and morally bankrupt urban setting. You're not special; you're not a hero. One night, a single gunshot shatters the silence, setting the wheels of fate in motion. You'll step into the shoes of a mundane janitor asked to complete a final task before clocking out, and it will turn into a pulp mystery as your fate collides with the aftermath of that pivotal gunshot.

Unravel your fate and cross the edge in this peculiar tale of obsession

name: Gladiator: About to die
summary: Travel to the ancient roman world and experience thrilling gladiator fights. Buy new arenas, train and take care of your gladiators and manage your fighting events to entertain the audience with the most exciting spectacles.

name: Glut: A Superabundance of Nothing
summary:
GLUT (a superabundance of nothing), by Johanna Hedva, is an inquiry into the knowings and unknowings of embodiment. It is a sound work composed with divination and AI, which manifests as both an immersive physical installation and videogame. The core of GLUT is a sound composition made entirely of Hedva’s voice, ranging from its rawest expression of screams, to two AI vocal clones that, in order to trick the surveillance tactics embedded in AI, have been manipulated to sound ever more de-human.

Disturbed that proprietary vocal-clone software services reserve the right to sell client voice data to governments and corporations, Hedva worked with artist, musician, technologist, and writer Jessika Khazrik to deceive the software, training it with Hedva’s voice disguised through multiple vocoding processes. Hedva and Khazrik created two vocal clones: Arid and Mud, neither of which are made from an actual human voice and therefore not actual vocal clones. In GLUT, these two AI voices speak a text corpus that Hedva built over four lunar cycles, and synthesized through various divination techniques. The corpus is composed of the writings of medieval mystics (mostly of the apophatic tradition); theoretical physicists, mathematicians, and philosophers writing about black holes, dark matter, night, and nothingness; poets and novelists on sleep, music, and the voice; and the algorithm of amazon.com.

In the game, users are a teratoma avatar that drags itself through an environment cheating at non-Euclidean geometry through a series of nesting black holes, intestinal tunnels, glittering caves, and oceans of black water. It is a digital experience that mirrors the physical installation (shown at the HKW Berlin) while producing a world that disorients as much as it confirms what knowledges are available to the body.

name: Global Pandemic
summary: Can you survive in a world with Zombies and Dinosaurs? Craft. Build. Survive. Create your own adventure!

name: Globber
summary: A Flash game titled ‘Globber’ was playable on an official Rayman 2 website, but can no longer be accessed. The name of the minigame is a pun on that of the popular game Frogger, which has similar game mechanics. In Globber, the player controls Globox – presumably before he adopted a new name and gave his old one to his son. Globox must cross a road while avoiding cars, then cross a river by jumping across logs, making sure not to fall in. He can go forwards and backwards, but not left or right. Crossing the road and river once earns the player 10 points; the game's difficulty increases as more points are earned. Globox has three lives; when all three are lost, the game is over.

name: Globox 2001
summary: Globox 2001 is a Flash game made by Ubisoft to celebrate the New Year of 2001. The game involves Globox shooting various creatures in different locations on Earth.

name: Glover
summary: This is the PlayStation port of Glover, a platforming video game featuring a magical, four-fingered glove named Glover in his quest to restore the Crystal Kingdom by retrieving crystals that were lost.

name: Glover
summary: The cult classic from the '90s returns! Glover is a charming 3D platformer where you control a magical glove on a quest to restore balance to the kingdom. Roll, jump, and manipulate your magic ball to solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and defeat the evil glove threatening the world!

name: Gladiators: Survival in Rome
summary:
Gladiators: Survival in Rome is an Action RPG with survival game mechanics and city-building aspects. You are a fugitive from Caesar's army, and will venture deep into the wilderness of Ancient Europe.
Free slaves from cruel soldiers, explore mythic secrets in barbarian and uncharted lands and build a city of free, surviving men. Craft your weapons and armor from what you have gathered, then slay the king's legions and conquer the Roman Empire!

name: Gladiator
summary:
After death, the evil are faced with judgement by the divine order of their world. They are given a chance at redemption: to compete in the gauntlet against their peers and slay a cursed enemy of the pantheon. The Gladiators who succeed in their quest are born anew into the world, those who fail are damned eternally.

Possess a Gladiator and take part in the gauntlet. Team up with your friends and engage colossal enemies in souls-like boss fights, join in epic PVP medieval combat, and devise strategic machinations in a desperate bid for absolution. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric and glorious gamble for exoneration. Victory results in vindication, defeat leads only to ruin.

name: Gladiatus
summary: In the Roman Empire, the player takes the role of a Gladiator to fight in arenas and venture in dungeons to earn the title of hero. The Gladiator's stats and inventory system works in similar ways to Blizzard Entertainment's Diablo. The player may choose to go on expedition to any location of the Italian country and islands and various places within the chosen location. Winning fights in arenas and killing monsters in dungeons earns the player experience as well as gold to purchase better equipment and necessities.

name: Globle
summary: Every day, there is a new Mystery Country. Your goal is to guess the mystery country using the fewest number of guesses. Each incorrect guess will appear on the globe with a colour indicating how close it is to the Mystery Country. The hotter the colour, the closer you are to the answer.

name: Gloo Storm
summary: Gloo Storm is a dynamic and dexterous game, mixing Capture the Flag, Death Race and Battle Arena. You take control of a Gloo, a monster with studied controls for a nervous gameplay.

name: GlassBox
summary: GlassBox is a puzzle game where you have to get a ball out of a maze using rotation and gravity. A Marble, a Crate, a Toilet Roll, a Doll - collect all 50 balls to help you beat the best time in 100 levels... or just play it chill... you decide.

name: Gleaner Heights: Season 2
summary: The first major expansion for Gleaner Heights! Brand new farming content, new people to meet, and a gripping main plot unlike anything you've ever seen in any farming game!

name: Glob
summary: An online fast-paced multiplayer party experience! Master the stretchy power of Glob to sling around the world and throw objects at your enemies! Compete in many competitive game modes or work with friends to solve puzzles and sling through the world together. Did we mention there are lasers?!

name: Gloomgrave
summary: Gloomgrave is a roguelike dungeon crawler with a retro pixel aesthetic. Upgrade your Gloomcrawler with unique perks and experiment with different builds as you try to survive each depth in search of the ultimate ancient relic.

name: Gloom: Digital Edition
summary: Gloom: Digital Edition is a dark, macabre game where your goal is to make your family as miserable as possible while bringing joy and good fortune to your opponent's families.

name: Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion
summary: The Jaws of the Lion DLC is the digital adaptation of the eponymous board game and expansion to Gloomhaven the critically acclaimed grim Tactictal RPG. Recruit 4 exclusive mercenaries and explore a new side of the world of Gloomhaven through an arching story filled with new enemies and bosses.

name: Glorious Day to Die
summary: Hardcore shooter where you will have to repel the attacks of the alien monsters using the various weapons and a dog, which can sniff invisible enemies.

name: GlowBoarding
summary: GlowBoarding hearkens back to old-school 90’s couch gaming days. With split-screen snowboarding, online snowmobile races and a unique puzzle arcade mode, there’s no shortage of things to discover on Moonlight Mountain. Deploy wacky power-ups, missiles and traps to gain a competitive edge.

name: Glory of the Survivor
summary:
In 2030 A.D. Aliens came to Earth but not friendly. The homeland of mankind got destroyed.
The only survivors were defending tough but still trying to seek any opportunity to turn the tide.
Until a high-tech device called 'Portal' was found in an abandoned research building by a little girl named Abby. 'Portal' is a kind of device that makes human flash back. Abby was extremely brave beyond her age, she was volunteered to be the first person for testing 'Portal', and she succeeded.
After that, Abby leaded survivors to fight back alien enemies. She brings the hope to victory, and would be named Glory of the Survivors.

name: Glitch Puzzle
summary: Glitch Puzzle is a classical puzzle in unusual anime style.

name: Glemsomhet
summary: Glemsomhet is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Eldrid, someone who refuses to leave their room and uses a box-like artifact to travel to another world and explores their "dream" world seeking effects.

name: Gliderman
summary: Gliderman is an open-world flight game where you play as a little glider trying to explore the randomly generated world around you. Pull off stunts and chase your highscore!

name: Glory's Fools
summary: A retro RPG set in the mythic Age of Greece. Find allies, choose your path to glory, fighting monsters, men, or even Gods and become a true hero!

name: Glitch Busters: Stuck on You
summary: It’s a normal day on the net, until a virus outbreak turns everything upside-down. Only your squad of Glitch Busters can take on the net’s kookiest bugs in an online world gone haywire in this 1-4 player co-op 3rd person shooter.

name: Glistening
summary: Glistening is a short sci-fi horror text adventure.

name: Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between - Deluxe Glitchpod Edition
summary:
Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between - Deluxe Glitchpod Edition includes:
- 5-Volume Deluxe Soundtrack for Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between
- Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between game

name: Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between - Chill Beats Edition
summary:
Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between - Chill Beats Edition includes:
- Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between
- Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between Original Soundtrack

name: Glyph
summary: Glyph is a match-three game. The player needs to save the world of Kuros by completing antique sculptures in 255 levels in five different worlds. Get three or more stones in one row so they disappear. If you manage to match four or more, you will get one of fourteen power-ups.

name: Glover: Collector's Edition
summary: The Kingdom's peaceful world has been shattered! The wizard, while mixing potions with his magical gloves has caused a huge explosion, turning him instantly to stone and dislodging the seven crystals that give the Kingdom its energy. Without the crystals, the castle and its world will fall apart and the wizard will be lost!

name: Glyph
summary: Maddie goes on a journey through the mind & memories of one that are not her own. An impressionistic map that should be suitably challenging for advanced players of Celeste.

name: Glory of War
summary: Glory of War is a nostalgic strategic turn-based RPG that combines the SLG mechanics.

name: Glyph 2
summary: Glyph 2 is a fantasy-themed tile-matching puzzle game. Each level consists of a grid of stones representing the five elements (wood, fire, water, metal, and aether) which the player must clear by clicking on a group of three or more adjacent stones. Clearing the stones will cause those above to fall down, new stones to fall into the play area from the top, and fill up the player's power meter. The power allows the player to use "gesture magic", which is activated by preforming certain movements with the mouse while holding down right click. The available gestures are indicated at the bottom left.

name: Glory Hounds
summary: Glory Hounds is a lighthearted action/romance visual novel set in Schippersburg, the futuristic capital of Batavia.

name: Glyph-Bound: Kotodama
summary: Track, train, and trade elemental spirits in Glyph-Bound! An indie MMORPG inspired by Pokemon Platinum, Final Fantasy Tactics, and Old School Runescape.

name: Glaciered
summary: Glaciered is an action-adventure indie game that takes place on a glacier-covered Earth 65 million years in the future. Play as a Tuai, a species evolved from birds, to soar through the seas and fight against the threats to this new golden age of life.

name: Glorp
summary: Glorp is a short 2D platformer created by Knocturnal Studios in which you play as the titular character Glorp, an incompetently drawn ball of slime journeying through a strange prism armed with just a flashlight.

name: Gli Animotosi e la Macchina Motante
Glass Bridge
summary: This is a Roguelike survival strategy game, where players click on glass to advance and jump, choose the correct glass by chance, and use skills by strategy. It has a certain scary flavor.

name: Glyde the Dragon
summary: Witness an epic story as Glyde and Wing set out on an adventure to find out the cause of mysterious corruption! Use 8 elemental forms with more than 60 different abilities! Explore the world, collect crystals, save other dragons and gain more insight into the story as you progress!

name: Glory of the Arena
summary: Amuse the audience to be the ultimate warrior. Fight with style. Show your skill. Never hold back. The entertainment is far more important than a kill. Gather the audience on your streaming platform and let them decide your fate!

name: Glass Hearts
summary: Gripping psychological thriller Yaoi game full of difficult choices. Can you trust your own mind?

name: Gladiator Rising
summary:
​Fight through five Chapters of constantly changing, randomly generated gladiators
Buy, equip and use items as you compete to become the ultimate warrior
Strategy is key to success in this mix of rogue-like and turn-based RPG mix with Hand Crafted Pixel Graphics, Permadeath, Lots of items, Learn 30+ unique spells and more!

name: Gleeb Glob
summary: GleebGlob is a physics based 2D precision platformer where you play as an emotionally drained employee of a very large corporation, who's only trying to slack off by immersing himself within a video game to delay the inevitable pile of work he must address.

name: Glowgrass
summary: You play as a xenohistorian on an expedition. You've been dropped (more literally than you planned) by a dropship over the ground of the Ancients. Your equipment was scattered and the dropship crashed. Now it's just you, your wits, and the Ancients to help you find a way home.

name: Glimmer
summary: It's bleak out there. No one would blame you for turning away.

name: Glitched? or Programmed that Way?
summary: Play as Robotess "Glitch" and traverse other worlds and their unforgiving hazards, traps and obstacles to save your destroyed world and ultimately defeat an evil edgelord. Face the challenges alone or with up to three friends online.

name: Gloomy Tales: Horrific Show - Collector's Edition
summary: A magical circus adventure with true disappearance! Watch the performance of a traveling circus and don't let your sister be hurt by the forces of evil!

name: GladiEaters
summary: A hybrid between Turn-Based Tactics and Cooking Mini-Games where food you cook turns into powerful Gladieaters for you to command. Cook your team from Eggs, Pastries and Vegetables - balancing the Taste of the team between Sweet, Salty and Umami - to unlock powerful taste twists.

name: Gladiators and Glory
summary: A Turn-Based Fighting Game Set in the Roman Era, where you can develop your Gladiators and fight them in arenas to increase the glory of your Ludus.

name: Glass: Petit Glass - Part.2
summary: SD puzzle, The Daily Story of the Glass World's Heroines part. 2

name: Glucky Labs
summary: A VMU game released with Evil Twin: Cyprien's Chronicles.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Glow Hockey 2
summary: Glow Hockey 2 delivers a new style of hockey game. Easy to play, hard to master. Challenge yourself with the computer opponents or play with your friends!

name: Glowmonkey2k
summary:
This is glowmonkey's origin story.
The year is 1998. A mysterious enemy threatens to end the world by the year 2000.
The enemy is hiding and building an army in multiple servers on the dark web. It mutates and grows stronger as it travels through the internet.
Only the best, and coolest special agent can save the world. Go on an adventure to defeat the enemy and discover its secrets!

name: Glass Masquerade 2: Illusions - Scaryfolks Puzzle Pack
summary: Continue your adventure in the Glass Masquerade 2: Illusions with 9 new puzzles where fantasy arts meets scary folks characters in stained glass - FREE demo puzzle included!

name: Glyph Guesser
summary: Guess the random sequence of glyphs with optional hints and alternate symbol sets.

name: Glitch
summary:
Its probably supposed to be like that. Maybe.
Yes, Glitch looks a lot like Pong. Its supposed to. It doesn't play much like it, however. Glitch takes common bugs made in game development and makes it the point of the game.
Or, maybe the point is to just sit across from someone see how long you can play, despite the Glitches.

name: Glow Unblock
summary:
This game Included Two Game mode
Unblock Me and Move Me Out !

name: Glow
summary:
Glow is an extremely addictive puzzle game, and by far the best game of its kind in AppStore yet!
The Rule is simple: Light-up the shape with a continuous line without retracing paths!
The addictiveness of this game has been proven with several similar Chart-Topping Apps! But have you been frustrated with their improvement-needed controls, and the limited puzzle counts?

name: Glass Heart
summary: A 20% chance is all you have to survive the surgery. Will love give you the strength to continue this life or will you be singing with the angels? The choice is yours in Glass Heart.

name: Glowmonkey vs. Meltdown
summary: A top view Flash flying/shooting game... Glowmonkey must stop his nemesis, Dolly Lamba, from destroying the earth. Dolly is melting all of the snow on Greenland, and he has taken Glowmonkey's friend, Purple Polar Bear, hostage. Destroy enemy aircraft, subs, robots, and base to save your buddy and the World!

name: Glowmonkey Skateboarding
summary: Have fun skateboarding downhill through the city. Avoid obstacles and do aerial tricks.

name: Glitch Party
summary: Glitch Party is a party game for 2-8 players online. Challenge your friends in different minigames, each with a small chance of being glitched. Welcome to Glitch Party!

name: Glory to the Robots!
summary: A game in the genre of management strategy. Here you can build your own factory for the production of robots, and on another planet, and extract resources and test robots on other different planets.

name: Gluua
summary: first-person 1-4 multiplayer horror game. The game will allow players to take on the role of a spirit liberator who will be able to freely choose missions based on the difficulty and readiness they like or want to do. Players will encounter the supernatural and find the truth in that place.

name: Glimpse
summary: "Step into the heartwrenchingly beautiful immersive animation Glimpse, a short interactive animation of 25 minutes which draws on the power of cinema and the uniqueness of VR storytelling to unravel the story of a breakup... avoidable or unavoidable, that's up to you to decide.

name: Glasshouse
summary: Feudalpunk CRPG, with Turn-based combat, set in a lockdown apartment block at the dawn of a world war. Investigate the mysterious triple murder next door, fight the Political Conspiracy, and make terrible choices before the flatmates do it for you!

name: Gladiator's Arena
summary: Gladiator's Arena is a top-down arena shooter rogue-lite where you play as a gladiator wielding up to 7 different medieval weapons to fight off hordes of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades and abilities to create unique builds.

name: Glory & Miserable Survivors DX
summary: Each heroine is a strong warrior in a different branch of the military, and she alone can hold off the approaching armies. What awaits the heroines is either a great victory or a desperate disaster...

name: Gloop
summary: Gloop is a 3D platformer where you play as a parasitic slime that aims to take over the world. Control and infect creatures to cover the world in slime.

name: Globetrotter XL
summary: Very popular clone of The Traveler IQ Challenge by TravelPod.com. Guess a given world location by clicking a location on a global map. The closer and faster the guess, the more points are awarded. Gain enough points to make it to the next stage.

name: Glass Wings
summary: Glass Wings is a fast paced third-person parkour platformer. Explore a stunning minimalist world in a series of linear courses in which your only objective is to complete the level. No combat, no story - just run.

name: Glimmer Chain
summary: Glimmer Chain is a skill-based platformer in which you are an energized robot with a hook and a chain. Swing and light up the city in the shortest time possible!

name: Glass Masquerade: Origins
summary:
Welcome to Glass Masquerade - an artistic puzzle game inspired by Art Deco & stained glass artisans of the 20th century. You need to combine hidden glass pieces to unveil clocks and themes exhibited by various cultures of the world at the 'International Times Exhibition' - an interactive electronic show.
The Origin's edition includes all the previously released DLCs

name: Glory to the Heroes
summary: Glory to the Heroes set in the Russian-Ukrainian war is a tactical first-person shooter with an immersive experience and massive multiplayer full-scale battles involving many kinds of different military units and vehicles, where the action is happening in the real-world locations of actual battles.

name: Gluttony Monster
summary:
The monster is hungry again.
At this time he targets on the delicious foods, but it is not easy to eat them.
He has to avoid the traps and bombs, all of which depends on your help.

name: Glory Room
summary: Glory Room is a Roguelike game that can be played quickly and lightly. It proceeds with stories of the characters who have no choice but to come to the hellish arena. Various items, monsters and traps give you trials. Overcome it and create your own show to defeat the demons and reclaim your glory!

name: Glassfish Bomb
summary: Tap Tap all the flashing glassfish balls!!! Be careful of the Bombs they are explosive!!!

name: Glyph
summary:
Glyph is a graceful, mind-bending puzzle game where lines making chain reactions are the way to achieving the highest scores.
Coupled with a soothing and relaxing soundtrack, Glyph is easy to play but difficult to master as you get to grips with making the decisions of which Glyphs to pop and which to mutate.

name: Glass Tactics
summary: 7 deadly sinners battle their way out of hell in this stained glass tactics game.

name: Glory or Dominance: The World of Kleiverog
summary: Glory or Dominance is a massive online multiplayer roleplay game with a social and competitive nature, where you can dive into an amazing adventure with amazing graphich and huge possibilities, full of action, fantasy, riddles, mysteries, and strong emotions.

name: Glum
summary: Take on the role of Glum, a grumpy goblin, fated to save his captured overlord. Arm yourself with a magical boot and become a mean ass-kicking machine as you go on a quest that’s way over your lousy minion paygrade.

name: Glimby
summary: It’s me! It’s me! Glimby! I’m your friend!

name: Gladiators Arena
summary: It’s time to attack! Train your troops, upgrade weapons, It’s time to battle it out on the world’s biggest ancient arena. Gather your troops and enter the battlefield. Let’s give our audience one heck of a show!

name: Glypha: Vintage
summary: A fast-paced, Egyptian-themed jousting tournament recalls 1980's classic arcade action.

name: Gladiators Tale
summary: Welcome to the brutal world of Gladiator's Tale, where you must fight tooth and nail to earn your freedom. In this immersive game, you'll encounter a wide range of characters - some will become your allies, while others will try to sabotage you. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Glasses and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Glass Masquerade 3: Honeylines
summary: Get ready for the Glass Masquerade sequel! With brand new textured glass pieces, immerse yourself in the beautiful world of painted glass art. Assemble jigsaw puzzles inspired by different cultures and themes with new play modes and various fragments cuts.

name: Glassfall
summary:
'Glassfall' is a funny arcade, an 'acrobatic adventure'. Its main protagonist is a small robot named Adapter (aka Dongle). The game takes place in a surreal place of 'deleted memories', where all objects: houses, cars, buses, planes etc. are mixed together creating a vertical maze.

Gravity is your enemy! You need to carefully jump down from one platform to another, without crashing. Once the protagonist reaches the very floor, you can travel to the next level.

name: Glitter Justice
summary: Armed with heart blasters and glitter grenades, fight in this girly pop FPS adventure to defeat robots with love and sparkles. Team up in co-op mode to spread love and chaos together!

name: Glorkian Warrior
summary: In Glorkian Warrior, you play as a cadet out to prove his worth and maybe get a promotion or two. Your trusty Super Backpack will help you fend off the incoming attackers by firing a constant stream of lasers into the sky. Grab power-ups dropped by the enemies to gain temporary access to some Glorkin' good weapons. And if anything is too low to shoot, leap over it! It's good, classic shoot-em-up fun.

name: Gloomscape
summary: Step into the eerie and mysterious world of Gloomscape! With your trusty mood ring and sense of adventure, you’ll craft, explore, and strategize your way through this bizarre world. But beware - ghastly creatures lurk around every corner.

name: Global Folktale
summary:
In Global Folktale animals have captured the land and humans have retreated to a faraway place. But after years of hiding the time for cowardice is over, as the people stand united and decide to fight back to reclaim what's theirs. Led by Allen, Prince of Zodia Kingdom, players gain control of an eight character party to battle their feral foes in a variety of locations and environments.

Unlike most strategy/RPGs, the combat takes place in real-time with 3D polygonal graphics, while each character is supported by a multitude of customization options, weapons, and items.

name: Gloomhaven: Mercenaries Edition
summary: Gloomhaven Mercenaries Edition includes Gloomhaven base game and the Solo Scenarios: Mercenary Challenges DLC.

name: Gloomhaven: Gold Edition
summary: Gloomhaven Gold Edition includes Gloomhaven base game, the Jaws of the Lion DLC and the Solo Scenarios: Mercenary Challenges DLC.

name: Glass2
summary: Aaron, the Eromancer of the Glass Hunter, who transforms the energy "libido" into cards, uses his cards to create a blast to save the Glassmaidens who are trapped in a glass world!

name: Glass
summary: Glass is 3D, first-person psychological thriller that will lead you through an increasingly dark and volatile world in search of an enigmatic author and his mysterious, tragic past. What you uncover will change you forever.

name: Globs & Ghosts
summary:
Save the globules colony from the deadly ghosts. You drive a nano-robot whose aim is to crunch the ghosts and their power ups, while sparing the globules.
Served by beautiful graphics, sounds and animation, this arcade game introduce a new type of gameplay that will bring you hours of fun!

name: Glasses
summary: Early work of Studio Pixel, you play as a short guy interested in catching his glasses.

name: Globematcher feat. Tokidoki x Hello Kitty
summary: A tokidoki and Hello Kitty match 3 puzzle game.

name: Glamour Pinball
summary: Glamour Pinball is original old Nokia pinball.

name: Gloom Reaper
summary: Take your scythe and get ready for the hunt in this 2.5D Platform Game; venturing into different regions to fight with Light and Darkness against dangerous creatures that dwell in the shadows. Do you have what it takes to emerge victorious?

name: Gluck
summary: Short 2D exploration adventure set in a mining company.

name: Glorious Storm
summary: Glorious storm is a real time strategy game with turn by turn strategy. It will be easy to understand and to master. When you start a new campaign, you can choose your appearence and the appearence of your army. The game is focus on giving a feel of 19th century battle and ambiance.

name: Gladiator Immortal
summary: Gladiator Immortal is a turn-based fantasy Gladiator Rougelike game where you manage a team of Gladiators who fight for the glory of the gods. Build up your town, hire and level up gladiators, find powerful weapons and armour, learn and develop new skills and win favour with the gods.

name: Gloom: System Breach
summary: A 3D sci-fi action adventure game in which the player takes on the role of a small robot controlled from a third-person perspective. We wake up in a non-working system, help to activate it by activating individual systems and fight opponents who defend the necessary parts.

name: Gloaming Comedian Simulator
summary: Survive a monstrous weekend in Transylvania using your sharpest weapon: humor. Gloaming Comedian Simulator combines Casual, Arcade, and Visual Novel genres in a hilarious adventure filled with frights and laughs. Get ready to steal the show in this ghoulishly gag-filled game!

name: Glam Descent
summary: Pictures of beautiful, sexy women are waiting for you. However, players need to respond quickly and accurately to challenge their highest scores and get beautiful pictures

name: Glixel
summary: Each Entity has a role to play... A reason why it is created... Something weird is going on in the Core... maybe an opportunity to do what she was made for?

name: Gloombase
summary: "Gloombase" is a love letter to early 2000s ZDoom mapping, employing linear, objective-based gameplay, and abundant use of ZDoom features such as slopes, colored lighting, ambient sounds, lightning and weather effects, and a LOT of scripted sequences including interactable NPCs and menus. It is also a teaser for something bigger still to come. Stay tuned!

name: Gloggy
summary: Collect glorbs by clearing ores in the glowfields with your limitless power of deduction - and a bit of help from detectors and extractors. Stay away from the ghosts or risk becoming one yourself. Rise through the ranks of miners to become the true Overglord, and use special traps and skills to win!

name: Glitch Busters: Boss Challenge Pack
summary: This new endgame "Challenge Mode" pits you and up to 3 others against six bosses one after another--and of course comes with new customization parts, 15 in total.

name: Glaive
summary: Each map is fairly small and should only take a few minutes to beat, but also should be fairly challenging on UV and be fun to blast through.

name: Glaive 2
summary: This is a set of 7 levels for Doom 2 inspired by the gameplay style of Scythe - short, straightforward, and fast paced, with plenty of action and challenge. While the first Glaive was techbase themed, this set is hell themed and aims to be much harder.

name: Glaive 3
summary: 10 short, action focused maps for Doom 2, inspired by Scythe. The wad is divided into 2 visual themes. The first 5 maps are techbases, the next 5 are a visual mashup of Shores of Hell, Plutonia and Scythe 2's jungle episode. The gameplay is classic styled mostly without slaughter, but there are some large fights.

name: Glider Pilot
summary: Glider Pilot is a flight simulation allowing you to try to fly a glider.

name: Glitchers: Hack 'em Up
summary: Fight and Hack enemies in this casual beat ‘em up fantasy game with a puzzle twist.

name: Gloves On!
summary: Pick up your gloves, wrap your hands, and put on your mouthpiece and headgear because Gloves On! is an action-packed boxing game with realistic and tactical controls. Get in the ring and fight an immersive and intense boxing match like you have never seen before.

name: Glitch Moba
summary: Welcome to Glitch! Suit up for explosive 5v5 MOBA battles in a vibrant sci-fi universe, customize your avatar with unique abilities, and dive into fast-paced, strategic skirmishes. Your mission, is to outwit opponents, demolish enemy firewalls, and capture their database. Gear up, it's game time!

name: Glassbreakers: Champions of Moss
summary: Lead your squad of Champions into an immersive arena in this exciting game of tactics, magic, and power! This 1v1 real-time battler puts you face to face with your opponent and their squad for action-packed gameplay that will keep you coming back for more.

name: Glix
summary: He just wanted to understand what was going on around him.

name: Global Conflict: The Trading Card Game
summary: Build, battle, and conquer your way to victory in Global Conflict - The Trading Card Game! Assemble decks with strategic precision and engage in fierce turn-based battles against rival factions. Each move and decision will shape the course of the game, offering endless challenges and triumphs.

name: Gloomy Village
summary: Gloomy Village is an erotic adventure with elements of survival. You are in the role of a big-breasted treasure hunter and adventurer - Evelyn.

name: Global Soldiers
summary: Global Soldiers is a video game published in 2005 on Windows by Clemens Hofmann. It's an action game, set in a shooter and fps themes.

name: Glais Gawizt
summary: Glais Gawizt is team-based action gameplay. This game has features like customization your character or adding equipments and skills to it's gameplay.

name: Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion - Alternative Skins
Glitched Lightning
summary: A top-down 2D science fiction RPG battler with crafting and resource gathering.

name: Glam Pursuit
summary: Enter the dazzling world of Glam Pursuit in Sunshine City. Master the unique acting system, shape your actor, and navigate the highs and lows of fame. Watch your scenes steal the limelight on the silver screen. Your path to stardom begins here!

name: Glowpop
summary: Beautiful and cute, but so tough it will make you scream. Glowpop is a platformer adventure inspired by Studio Ghibli's art style. And it's difficult. Like really difficult. It will punish you.

name: Glyphen
summary: Glyphen is an Immersive Spellcasting Adventure in which you draw mysterious Glyphs to cast spells. Glyphs have meanings and can be combined to invoke complex magic. Draw Glyphs, create spells and become a mage.

name: Glukhovo
summary: Sometimes, regrets come too late. When you're over 40, you start to rethink your life. You remember people and events that completely changed you. I will tell you 7 stories that happened to me in childhood, after which I became a different person.

name: Gloomier Keep
summary: Knave-style remix/remake of E1M5 / Gloom Keep.

name: Gloomy Tales: One-Way Ticket - Collector's Edition
summary: Investigate the mysterious disappearances plaguing the Halloween party and confront the elusive Allister, the sinister monster responsible for these chilling abductions!

name: GlagStone
summary: Real-time narrative city-building economic simulator

name: Gleam and The Eternal Night
summary: Gleam has been chosen by The Covenant to seek out The Great Star and put an end to The Eternal Night. On her way, she encounters something...

name: Glitched Out
summary: Trapped in the depths of a top secret alien research facility, Lex must team up with A.I companion 'Chip' and hack her way to freedom. Along the way, she discovers the sinister secrets of the facility and meets the many monstrous creatures contained within.

name: Glass Masquerade 3: Honeylines - Wings & Tunes
summary: The "Wings & Tunes" puzzle set contains 8 new puzzles representing 2 new themes with 4 puzzles in each, respectively.

name: Gloomy Tales: One-Way Ticket DLC
summary: Dare to face the darkness, uncover the secrets, and emerge victorious in the face of the unknown. The adventure awaits - are you ready to embark on it?

name: Global Candy Cup 2015
summary: Welcome to the Global Candy Cup, a fierce competition where four extraordinary witches race to collect the most candy before the end of Halloween. Join one witch’s worldwide team and keep playing throughout the day to add to your team’s score. Only one team will go home with the Cup — will it be yours?

name: Globalism
summary: A global strategy for the 21st century. The threat of nuclear war, economic inequality, overpopulation of some regions and extinction of other regions, the crisis of capitalism... Find your solutions to the current problems of mankind!

name: Glitch Daddy
summary: You have a strange dream where you meet a creature named Glitch Daddy, telling you that the world is ending. Then, you wake up and go to unravel the truth through a wild, abstract psychedelic journey.

name: Glitcher
summary: Glitcher is a Tactical Espionage game where you play as a computer virus.

name: Gladiator Manager
summary:
Take charge of a ludus in ancient Rome, and build an unstoppable team of gladiators!

Gladiator manager allows you to control the career of your gladiators in detail, and to construct training facilities, as well as grand monuments! You will be opposed by rival gladiator schools, as well as upstart rebels lead by Spartacus himself!

name: Glimpse
summary: "Glimpse" is a single-player atmospheric horror game. Get a glimpse of the struggles and fears of a person affected by Alzheimer's Disease.

name: Gloomy Island
summary: Gloomy Island - the game is a mixture of an adventure game and classic quests. Early in the morning you wake up and receive a letter from a mysterious stranger. The letter contained an address with coordinates unknown to you and a request to find important documents.

name: Gladio Mori
summary: Gladio Mori is a cutting-edge physics-based multiplayer fighting game where you use razor-sharp weapons to cut down your enemies or die trying. Pick your blade, choose your armour and create a fighting style unique to you. Enter the arena to face your friends or hone your abilities against the AI.

name: Glowing Abyss
summary: Explore the depths of the ocean as a plankton, revive the decaying sea life, and rescue other plankton. Illuminate the ocean floor and bring life back to it!

name: Global Domination
summary: Global Domination is a strategy game about the world conquest developed by Impression Games.

name: Glitchspankr
summary: After a hard day of existing you just want to relax and play your favorite game, Big Booty Slapper 6! Unfortunately, there seems to be a rogue virus eating and corrupting your precious game! Using the GlitchSPANKR Antivirus software, dive into virtual worlds and Spank that Glitch! Or befriend him. Or spare his poor, ugly, miserable life. Maybe give him a smooch... fall in love... Oh, uhem. Well there are a lot of options. Just... get in there and figure it out.

name: Gladiatorial Conquest: Battle Arena of Legends
summary: Step into the thrilling world of Gladiatorial Conquest Battle: Arena of Legends, an epic game set in the heart of the Middle Ages where the arena echoes with the clash of swords and the roar of the crowd.

name: GlobeXplore
summary: GlobeXplore Drone Simulator provides FPV drone flying on Google Earth. Enjoy lightweight operation, customizable sensitivity, and adjustable camera angles with 3D global views. Ideal for advanced pilots, the simulator continuously improves with user feedback.

name: Gloaming Comedian Simulator: Scapegoath Science
summary: "Scapegoath Science," the first DLC for Gloaming Comedian Simulator, plunges Barry Sazou into a comically chaotic world of the Mad Scientist. Survive another weekend in Transylvania making your way out of cheer jokes.

name: Gloomsday
summary: Gloomsday is an action-packed roguelite platformer with a unique spellcasting mechanic. Your spellcasting resource is in the world around you--no mana bars here! As you cast your "gloomspells", you'll find the serene, yet gloomy landscape go dark and grey... but the magic will return soon enough.

name: Glory to Ukraine!
summary: On February 24, Russia invaded Ukraine. Your task is kill the invaders. Use any available weapons: knive and axe, machine gun and grenades. Be careful, the enemy is crafty and merciless. The fate of Ukraine depends on you.

name: Gleylancer & Gynoug Combo Pack
summary: ~ Gleylancer + Gynoug ~

name: Glay: Complete Works
summary: Including such as discography and biography of the popular rock band "GLAY", appeared on the PS multimedia software of fan must-have was recorded a variety of data. Two other songs of live video, which is also found in each angle, such as magazine interview article of 1994-1999, we have plenty of recording a variety of content.

name: Glorg
summary: Glorg is a procedurally-generated dungeon crawler RPG developed by Grapefrukt. The main gimmick of this game is that you use only one button, the left mouse button, to do everything.

name: Glitch Blaster's Waifu
summary: Welcome to 'Glitch Blaster's Waifu,' the ultimate retro-style shoot 'em up adventure! As an intrepid hacker, you find yourself pitted against a malevolent AI that has kidnapped innocent girls.

name: GlaiveBound
summary: Explore a magical world full of puzzles, treacherous dungeons, and fearsome foes, in a Zelda-inspired co-op adventure.

name: Gladiatory
summary: Gladiatory - a Roguelite Hack & Slash RPG Game

name: Glitter
summary: It is a casual puzzle game with great features and advantages.

name: Glyphica: Typing Survival
summary: Glyphica is a typing-roguelike that blends survival and strategy. Type to shoot. Test your keyboard mastery, unlock powerful upgrades, and craft overpowered builds to destroy hordes of enemies.

name: Gloomgeons
summary: Gloomgeons is a retro style 3D first person perspective game that combines the nostalgia of legend FPS games with the dungeons exploration. Step into a mysterious world of skeletons, wizards and golems.

name: Glitch Maze.exe
summary: In this fast-paced arcade game, inspired by Pac-Man, you navigate through a dark maze, chasing the highest score. Avoid the lurking dangers, find secrets and game-changing power-ups as you explore the maze. And remember, even your failures can illuminate your path through the darkness.

name: Glitch Gears
summary: Dive into a 32-bit generation-inspired arcade driving game where you outmaneuver digital pursuers in a world of ever-changing landscapes. Master intuitive controls and dynamic environments in this thrilling escape to freedom.

name: Glow
summary: GLOW is an addictive physics-based arcade game that will challenge you to your limits. Push, dodge, and trick enemies while collecting points as the difficulty increases.

name: Glue 10
summary: Create and control physics-based vehicles and structures with total freedom to win the Glutenberg challenges.

name: Glompa
summary: Solve matching puzzles in this cozy linker game. Go fishing and relax with your Glompa friends.

name: Global Elite
summary: Save the Earth from countless swarms of giant insects as a valiant member of the GLOBAL ELITE! Auto-battle your way to victory with a ragtag crew of survivors! Use every weapon at your disposal to crush those bugs and save humanity! Join the fight and become a member of the GLOBAL ELITE!

name: Gleep Gym
summary:
Hi, human! Welcome to the Gleep Gym! Meet the other members and try to succeed in their challenges! Will your power level be enough to beat them??

Reach for the stars in this 00s flash inspired warioware-like ! This game was created as part of the GameDev.JS 2024 jam in 13 days with the theme 'POWER'. Thank you for playing Gleep Gym!

name: Globeba
summary: Your magic tome has been stolen by the weather wizard Ogro! Use your summoning magic to plant helpful tubers and mandrakes to make your way through three handcrafted dungeons. Overcome foe after foe to retrieve what is rightfully yours and reunite with your floral friends!

name: Glyphs of Gitzan
summary: Explore mysterious ruins and uncover their secrets by mastering the glowing glyphs!

name: Global Farmer
summary: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map! Want to experience a rich strawberry harvest in the French countryside? Or challenge the hot sun in South America? The choice is yours!

name: Gladiate!
summary:
A Spectacle Fighter Card Game.

Play with 6 unique decks and fight your way through a gauntlet of foes. Not only do you need to fight to survive, but also pull off combos to maximize your spectacle points and please the crowd. Can you make it to the final boss and emerge victorious?

name: Gloom Deluxe
summary: Gloom Deluxe is an enhanced port of doom-clone Gloom for the Amiga, with updated graphics, workbench functionality, and increased speed for faster cards.

name: Glint Glitters
summary:
Glint Glitters features a group of young kids experts in robotics that build robots. One day when the main character is building a small robot his rival in the classroom appear with a bigger robot and tell him that he's going to participate in the robots competition. So he decided to build a bigger version of his robot and take part on the competition too.

The competition is a board game in which the winner is the first one in arrive to the goal (get 20000 of gold). During the board there will be events, traps, shops (Where the player can buy items for his character or the robot) and other situations that can help or act against the players.

The game features 2D cartoon graphics, japanese voices and anime sequences.

name: Global Resistance
summary: Global Resistance was a social media game for the Resistance series.

name: Glusiverse
summary: Help GlusiGlusi in this adventure to find the remedy to his master illness.

name: Glen: A Dull Journey into the Unremarkable
summary: This is a game for dull people with short attention spans. You can probably clock it in 10-20 minutes! You'll perform tasks like paying your bills, watching some paint drying and reading local council regulations. It's dull and relatable. Should you buy it? Well, up to you, but I appreciate you all.

name: Glow Up 1
summary: Glow up the characters for each of the 9 stages, Units are divided into red and blue teams for auto-battle. Click to predict the winning team. If you guess right, you will be able to see the whole of the characters that have been Glow up.

name: Glogwillette
summary: An adventure for the family... use the Arrow keys, E to shoot (only if a baddy is nearby!), and sometimes you will need to use the mouse

name: Glass Masquerade 3: Honeylines - Folks & Spirits
summary: The "Folks & Spirits" puzzle set contains 10 new puzzles representing 2 new themes with 5 puzzles in each, respectively - FREE demo puzzles included!

name: Globe Drone
summary: GLOBE DRONE - An Earth Simulator

name: Gloria in Somnium
summary: It's time to wake up...

name: Glitch of The Game
summary: A small indie rpg/puzzle game where you will need to figure out various glitches and exploits in order to defeat The Big Bad.

name: Glowie Rammer
summary: The glowies are out to get you! You just run them over, that's what you do. Fast-paced racing meets spine-chilling horror. In this endless runner, you are not just racing against time but also against the ones who glow in the dark.

name: Gloomy Detective and Devil Girl
summary: 15 year old Haruta Ichihara conducts a ritual to summon the demon girl Lyrae, not seeking her services or power, but desiring for his soul to be consumed. However, instead of complying, Lyrae proposes assistance to Haruta—not through soul consumption, but by unraveling the murder he’s been accused of.

name: Glitch World
summary: Glitchworld is a retro-platform-shooter where the levels change WHILE YOU PLAY! How far will you make it?

name: Globe Games
summary: A suite of turn based games and puzzles on a spherical grid: Chess, Go, and Othello.

name: Gladiator Of Valor
summary: "Enter the arena in 'Gladiator of Valor,' a thrilling hack and slash adventure in the underworld colosseum. Play as Arcus, Zeus's son, battling fierce demons, orcs, undead, and mythical creatures. Face epic challenges and prove your might in this intense, action-packed journey for glory!"

name: Glowie Shooter
summary: They glow in the dark and they are coming to get you. You'll need to endure the relentless waves of upcoming glowies. Can you survive the night and get them before they get you?

name: Glingdom
summary: In "Glingdom," you're a hero in a medieval world, battling enemies and bosses with a deck of cards. Beat enemy waves and bosses, buy cards to strengthen your deck, and unlock new cards. Each deck offers unique challenges.

name: GladMort
summary: In a faraway kingdom in a land of legend, a mysterious plague of unknown origin has rapidly infected the population. Dubbed the "Red Plague", the evil nature of the phenomenon is unmistakable: the dead begin to rise from their graves, and demonic incarnations begin to appear.

name: Glow Up 2
summary: Glow up the characters for each of the 9 stages, Units are divided into red and blue teams for auto-battle. Click to predict the winning team. If you guess right, you will be able to see the whole of the characters that have been Glow up.

name: Gloomy Eyes
summary: A cozy horror, “self-coop”, adventure about two unlikely souls who forge a forbidden bond and journey together to find the sun. Explore eerie yet charming Tim Burton-esque levels, switch between two unique characters, and solve brain-teasing puzzles.

name: Gladiator
summary: This game is based on the same named blockbuster. Choose one of nine characters and fight on the hot sand of Colosseum's arena. All fighters has different abilities and fighting styles. Survive in all combats and get win in the final battle! There are 3 game modes and two-player Bluetooth multiplayer mode too.

name: Gladiators Battle
summary:
Step into Gladiators Battle, a captivating free-to-play online game that immerses you in the glory and grit of Ancient Rome’s famed arenas. Challenge yourself across 21 diverse mini-games, covering Combat, Puzzles, and Gambling. Each mini-game is crafted to test your strategy, skill, and luck, offering unique paths to honor and reward. From rigorous training to high-stakes tournaments and games of chance, each victory takes you one step closer to greatness!

Discover our extensive History section, filled with engaging insights into the life of gladiators, Roman warfare, and ancient traditions. With detailed lore spread across multiple pages, and a comprehensive glossary to deepen your understanding, you’ll be part of a living history as you explore and compete.

Earn Gold through each mini-game, then head to the Marketplace to strengthen your gladiator with powerful gear and exclusive items. Buy, sell, and trade your way to the top—without spending a single dime! Gladiators Battle is completely free-to-play, with no microtransactions, ensuring a pure and competitive experience. Use your gold wisely to boost your strength, challenge others, and rise to dominance, creating your own legend.

Join Guilds, forge alliances, and battle players and AI alike as you compete for glory. With unmatched strategic depth and an immersive historical experience, Gladiators Battle is not just a game—it’s an epic journey through ancient times where your legend awaits.

name: Gluttony Gods
summary: A liminal game about love, apotheosis and rot.

name: Glow Storm
summary: Wield a powerful shield in this neon-lit 2D bullet hell where timing is everything. Destroy enemies with strategic shield activations and harvest their sparks as allies. Master the balance between offense and defense in vibrant arenas, then challenge yourself in Hard Mode for the ultimate test.

name: Glass Horizon
summary: Experience the freedom of parkour in "Glass Horizon." Leap across rooftops, overcome obstacles, and explore a futuristic city. With fluid movements and thrilling challenges, your skills will be put to the test. Are you ready to conquer the horizon?

name: Globs
summary: Globs is a puzzle game about the size-changing Globs. Use the properties of their bodies at your advantage to solve a variety of levels, by using them to push each other or against walls, squeeze into tight gaps, grow to block holes.

name: Gladiator's Arena
summary: Win in the Gladiator's Arena! Dominate and conquer!

name: Glimmer and the Dark Halloween Pumpkin
summary: In the quiet town of Hollowhill, every Halloween, lanterns not only light up the streets, but also protect the town from the dark forces that lurk.

name: Glass Heart: Retold
summary: A modern romance otome/visual novel filled with drama, angst, adventure and, most of all, love. With a twenty percent chance to survive, you decide to experience living outside of a hospital for the first time. Can your heart handle the love that you find along the way?

name: Glitch Hero
summary: A fatal error has trapped Ada’s father inside Codeland! As young Ada, wield the (virtually) mighty hammer.exe and debug the corrupted virtual world while learning basic coding concepts in an irreverent, fun and thrilling action puzzle adventure.

name: Gladiators of Citadelum
summary: The ultimate gladiator management sim. Hire and train fighters in different disciplines, defeat your rivals in the arena, climb through the ranks and, remember, give the best spectacle Rome has ever seen to survive. Blood and glory await!

name: Glintseeker Island
summary: Explore procedurally generated dungeons, uncover exciting secrets, excavate countless treasures, and fight enemies and bosses. Save the island from a mysterious threat below!

name: Glider Simulator
summary: Human beings have always carried the dream of free flight, and the birth of gliders has brought hope, but not everyone has the courage to try. However, in VR, there is a magical software that allows you to experience the wonderful feeling of free flight!

name: Global Shipping Simulator
summary: Dive into the fast-paced world of logistics and become the master of delivery. Manage your business, customize your space, and ensure every order is delivered on time. Can you build a delivery empire?

name: Glitch
summary: Glitch :) would have been a great, calm and fun game... If it weren't completely corrupted. A terrible virus has invaded the game's files and left it completely bugged. Fortunately, when even the hero of the story gets completely stuck, from the confines of the game's files, there's hope...

name: GlitchGuesser
summary:
Step back into the nostalgia of the early internet with GlitchGuesser, the ultimate party game that turns pixelated chaos into a thrilling guessing competition! As distorted, compressed images gradually become clear, it’s a race against time to figure out what you’re seeing. Can you guess before anyone else?

Whether it’s a movie still, an anime character, a famous brand, or even custom creations, GlitchGuesser offers endless fun for players of all skill levels.

name: Global Transport
summary: Global Transport is a fun and engaging game that will test your problem-solving and time-management skill

name: Glade of Tranquility
summary:
Live inside the glade of tranquility, shielded by a bubble from the outside world. You are isolated here, nothing and no one can disturb you. You spend your days fishing while the world around you develops in chaos.

How long will you manage to live in this perfect place of tranquility until the bubble bursts and you have to face reality?

name: Glory On Pluto
summary: Bring prestige back to Earth by building your engines and finding Glory on Pluto in this offbeat and unique deckbuilding rougelike.

name: Gloomfall
summary: Gloomfall is a dark fantasy open-world Roguelike game. Explore a diverse, procedurally generated open-world, learn unique skills, fight, complete objectives, craft, and trade.. Become the strongest hero, by defeating the most powerful forces of evil in each region.

name: Glowkeeper
summary: A luminescent puzzle game about manipulating elements. By the light of fireflies, link and dissolve elemental forces to construct bridges, break through obstacles, and traverse a glowing, interconnected world.

name: Global Magnates: Shipping Tycoon
summary: Global Magnates: Shipping Tycoon is a maritime simulation game, placing you at the head of a fledgling shipping empire with a new technology: the shipping container.

name: Glitch
summary:
Glitch was a casual, 2D browser-based game featuring a strong multiplayer component. It deliberately steered away from combat mechanics, instead focusing on collaborative crafting and gathering activities. Players were prompted to complete quests and perform various activities that would change the persistent world. Players were invited to expand upon the world, shaping its growth through various activities such as growing plants and trees and cooking food items.

Glitch was officially launched on September 27, 2011, but reverted to beta status on November 30, 2011, citing accessibility and depth issues. Glitch was officially shut down on December 9, 2012.

name: Glow Journey
summary: Glow Journey is a minimalist action-roguelike where you control an orb navigating a procedurally generated world. Dodge enemies and traps, collect XP, and choose powerful upgrades to survive longer and reach new levels in this fast-paced survival adventure.

name: Gloamvault
summary: "90s Black Metal Monster Collector!" In Gloamvault, you can charm any monster you encounter and add it to your party. Create a party with up to five minions and descend into the depths of the dungeon. Fuse any two monsters together to create stronger ones. Good luck surviving...

name: Gladiator Rumble
summary: Where your audience transforms into fierce gladiators, ready to fight for glory in the ultimate Twitch-integrated battle simulator.

name: Gladiators Idle
summary: Gladiators IDLE is an IDLE game where you will train your gladiators and upgrade your gladiators equipment. The stronger you get in this game will allow you to move further in the Arena!

name: Global Chess
summary: A chess-based global conquest game

name: Gloomy Tales: Hotel Frightsylvania - Collector's Edition
summary: You've been invited to a private party, but this isn’t your average celebration. The shadows of the ancient castle hide dark secrets, and you’ll need your wits to survive the night.

name: Glory Destiny: Reborn
summary: Explore a new fantasy story in the global version of Glory Destiny - Reborn! Step into a whole new world with new classes, innovative gameplay, and thrilling adventures in the classic MMORPG.Return to the Forest Kingdom, defend your homeland, and join the Shield of Glory as a new-generation hero.

name: Globaglorp Simulator
summary: A game where you look after a jelly pet and try not let it die from starvation

name: Glimmer Fighters
summary: Glimmer Fighters is a shining new 2.5D Fighter on the horizon. Fight in action-packed 1v1 matches. With easy controls, any beginner may try out this exciting new installment amongst fighting games.

name: Glass Masquerade 3: Honeylines - Tales & Strives
summary: The "Tales & Strives" puzzle set contains 10 new puzzles representing 2 new themes with 5 puzzles in each, respectively - FREE demo puzzles included!

name: Gladiators Simulator: The Champions of Liberty
summary: Fight for glory, battle for freedom!

name: Glamour Riot
summary: This is an absurd and hilarious action game where you play as a beauty pageant contestant. Ruthlessly beat up your rivals backstage while delivering flawless performances on stage. Ruin their faces, knock them out, and impersonate them to sabotage everything. You’ll become the beauty queen!

name: Glass Beads
summary: “I’ve forgotten everything about mathematics!” Join charming characters and an engaging story as you tackle math‑based puzzles and uncover hidden secrets in this heart‑warming Super‑Mathematics puzzle novel game!

name: Gladiator Fights
summary: Hold the Line. Command the Fight. Survive the Chaos.

name: Gladiator Manager
summary: Gladiator Manager is a sports management and tactical battle simulation game.

name: Global Force
summary:
Global Force is a tactical RPG in which the player takes the role of the members of the Global Force a organization that defends the peace in the planet against different enemy armies.

The game is a tactical rpg in which the player got a limited number of units that can use in each turn and those unit got a limited range of movements. There are different vehicles like planes, tanks and others to use.

name: Glass Cannon
summary: Challenging and chill roguelike where you plan your shots carefully and creatively eliminate enemies using different weapon combinations. Buy weapon mods to create powerful synergies and clear all 24 rounds.

name: Glimpse
summary: After a dimensional transporter renders The Girl and her siblings obsolete, they must flee from The Company that created them in this gripping alternate 1980s timeline thriller.

name: Gloctopus
summary: It's you, and 8 glocs, up against the whole ocean - are you up to the task? Gloctopus is a fast paced 2D Roguelike shooter about a gun-wielding octopus on a mission to stop a nuclear warhead from destroying the world.

name: Glow Cubes
summary: Glow Cubes is a set of puzzles like Rubik's Cubes, but with different movement rules. Can you solve these never-before-seen challenges? Unlike with physical cubes, you can save your place, and use other features shown below. Wishlist now to be the among first to solve these unique puzzles!

name: Gloamryn
summary: A mystical strategy game set in a world of eternal twilight.

name: Glimvale: My Mini Overworld
summary: Manage and customize your little fantasy village, make your adventurers happy with cute and varied shops and decorate their environment as you please. After all, you are the master of the game !

name: Glyphs
summary:
GLYPHS is a difficult puzzle-platformer about exploration and persistence.

Traverse the depths of the Tomb of Forbidden Knowledge; a sentient labyrinth containing traces of the past in the form of glyphs. Formidable bosses, platforming, and puzzles stand in the way of discovery - GLYPHS fulfills the extent that one willingly searches for true knowledge.

EPILEPSY WARNING - This game has occasional drastic color flashes/sudden color changes

name: Glyphora
summary: GLYPHORA is a roguelike typeracer-style game where words and letters can be upgraded. In this unique typing-focused experience, you choose from several runes and progress through increasingly difficult levels, shop for upgrades, select powerful (or risky) glyphs.

name: Gladiato Potato
summary: Play as a brave potato in this challenging roguelike, facing off against enemies. Ready to be the hero of your own adventure?

name: Glyphscape
summary: A retro turn-based RPG with souls-like and metroidvania elements. Craft spells by combining magical glyphs, dispatch enemies through turn-based combat, discover the secrets and rich history in a deeply interconnected open world!

name: Glitch: Dead Loop Horror
summary: Code the game. Survive the night.

name: GleanBound
summary: GleanBound: is first-person horror semi-realistic maze runner that mixes adrenaline-fueled chase mechanics with creepy events and terrifying creatures. Collect soul stones and stay ahead of what's hunting you — but remember, every corner could be your last.

name: Glorious Golf
summary: A fun rage platform game where you ascend a farm as a golf ball!

name: Gluttony
summary: In the 2D action roguelike Gluttony, devour endless waves of Food Devils! Swallow enemies whole to steal their powers, then explode when your belly is full. Constantly decide where to move, who to eat, and which powers to upgrade. Without razor-sharp judgment, survival is impossible.

name: Global Farmer: Central America
summary: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map! With this free map pack you will be able to place your farm anywhere in Central America!

name: Global Farmer: Africa
summary: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map! With this free map pack you will be able to place your farm anywhere in Africa!
