summary: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map! With this free map pack you will be able to place your farm anywhere in Australia and Oceania!

name: Glowface In Love 2
summary: Glowface is back - and this time his heart is beating even brighter. A new chapter full of magic, adventure and emotion begins in "Glowface in Love 2". Accompany the glowing hero on a journey through 28 new levels in which not only tricky puzzles but also emotional twists and turns await him.

name: Glitchout
summary: GLITCHOUT is a post-apocalyptic MMO Idle RPG with turn-based combat, factions, base-building, and random chaos at every step. Here you might get attacked by an NPC missing its script, a drunken vacuum cleaner, or a TV boss.

name: Glintland
summary: Glintland is a magical factory-building card puzzler. Place tiles from a deck to build enchanting production chains, light up the land, and discover a cozy world full of secrets. Each Glint is a short, satisfying journey of automation and alchemy.

name: Glint's Trial
summary: Take control of Glint, a glowing explorer on a mission through 15 pixel-perfect platforming levels filled with deadly traps and quirky enemies. Inspired by classic retro games, Glint’s Trial delivers tight controls, charming pixel art, and speedrun-ready challenges. Whether you're hopping past spikes or dodging fishes every level is a handcrafted test of reflexes and memory. Can you survive the trial and prove you're a true retro platforming master? A game developed by CraePlay and ported by GGmuks

name: GladiArena
summary: It's very inadequate. Please take care of it.

name: Glassy Stare
summary: A story-driven psychological experience where memory fades, silence deepens, and something waits in the dark.

name: Gloomy Clues
summary: Immerse yourself in a dark point & click adventure with an anime aesthetic. Solve murders, uncover secrets, and confront the demons of your past as a detective tormented by guilt.

name: Global Rescue
summary: Build your own base in Global Rescue and take command of firefighting, police, EMS, and SWAT operations — either in your hometown or any city around the world! Manage your fleet, hire staff, and take on a variety of authentic operations. Are you ready for your shift?

name: Glass Masquerade 4: Constellations
summary: Get ready for the next Glass Masquerade sequel! Immerse yourself in the beautiful world of stained glass art, split into constellations with various themes on the celestial map

name: G-LOC: Air Battle
summary: G-LOC: Air Battle is a Game Gear port of the original arcade game. It features a new point system that can be used to upgrade the jet. This version was later ported to 3DS.

name: G-LOC: Air Battle
summary: G-LOC: Air Battle is a Master System port of the original arcade game. This version features new bosses that are not in the arcade version.

name: Gloria's House
summary: Gloria's House helps you enhance focus during work and study sessions. Collect ​Time Coins to purchase decorative items, personalize Gloria's cozy cottage, and craft a uniquely warm environment that reflects your style.

name: Glory to the Heroes
summary: No glory without sacrifice.

name: G-LOC R360
summary: Vigilante forces have raided government military installations and "confiscated" tanks, planes, even warships! Pilot your G-LOC fighter to victory against the guerillas. Only you have the skills to get the job done and save the day!

name: G-LOC R360
summary: Vigilante forces have raided government military installations and "confiscated" tanks, planes, even warships! Pilot your G-LOC fighter to victory against the guerillas. Only you have the skills to get the job done and save the day!

name: G-Loc R360
summary: Vigilante forces have raided government military installations and "confiscated" tanks, planes, even warships! Pilot your G-LOC fighter to victory against the guerillas. Only you have the skills to get the job done and save the day!

name: G-LOC R360
summary: Vigilante forces have raided government military installations and "confiscated" tanks, planes, even warships! Pilot your G-LOC fighter to victory against the guerillas. Only you have the skills to get the job done and save the day!

name: G-LOC R360
summary: Vigilante forces have raided government military installations and "confiscated" tanks, planes, even warships! Pilot your G-LOC fighter to victory against the guerillas. Only you have the skills to get the job done and save the day!

name: G-LOC: Air Battle
summary: Vigilante forces have raided government military installations and "confiscated" tanks, planes, even warships! Pilot your G-LOC fighter to victory against the guerillas. Only you have the skills to get the job done and save the day!

name: Gladiatorum: Sacramentum
summary: A deep management strategy sim blending political intrigue and character-driven narrative. Acquire and train gladiators with unique backstories and skills, manage your ludus from resources to staff, and navigate a world of political maneuvering and sabotage. Every choice leads to glory or ruin.

name: Glitch & Glory: Tales of Honeywood
summary: Glitch and Glory: Tales of Honeywood is a parody RPG where you, an adventurer, tackle absurd quests in a satirical MMORPG world. Save sheep, negotiate with ghosts, and avoid fines. Sarcastic dialogue, impactful choices, and retro graphics await!

name: Glitch
summary: The AI Security has GLITCHED out! You must not get detected as you try to escape a security AI system that has gone rogue in this puzzle adventure. Use your two playable characters to solve puzzles and escape the building. Explore the mysterious facility, and don't get caught!

name: Gladston Valley
summary:
Two friends reunite amidst a disturbing string of murders in the small town of Gladston Valley. The crime scenes are gruesome, leading many of the townspeople to believe a monster lives in the valley.

Torches and pitchforks are drawn as the bloodshed feeds into a growing unrest. At the precipice of disaster, only Leo knows what is truly going on.

name: Glitchfall
summary: Detect system anomalies! A fresh take on falling block puzzles that mixes Tetris-style gameplay with observation challenges.

name: Gloop
summary: Indie game developer dedicated to creating fresh, imaginative games that spark curiosity and exploration. With a focus on unique mechanics and heartfelt storytelling, I aim to deliver memorable adventures that challenge, entertain, and inspire. Feedback welcome

name: Glow
summary:
Glow is a 2D Jump'n'Run inspired by Lunistice. Play as an alien glow-blob as it finds itself trapped in cyberspace and must find it's way out.

Move, jump, and attack your way to the end of the level.

name: Glitch Core
summary: A tactical FPS Rogue Lite where you take on the role of a rogue AI (Pun intended). Honing your skills in relentless combat simulations, until you uncover the unsettling truth of your existence....

name: Gloom Punks
summary: Not your average co-op roguelike. Where the price for power is death, and you’re trapped in a gloom-scape of fever dreams and fairytales gone feral, you can only rely on Punks like yourself. Cheat death, bounce back, and take on a world that so badly wants you dead!

name: Globalization
summary: Prepare to journey through treacherous levels filled with countless dangers!

name: Glass x Cannon
summary: GLASS x CANNON is a risky top down shooter roguelike. You are always very low health so you'll have to dodge and use blood to survive. Collect items and get stronger to defeat a powers, crossing into our world.

name: Glowing Stones: Heroes' Awakening
summary: Glowing Stones: Heroes' Awakening is an adult visual novel centering around themes of romance, friendship, superpowers and superheroes in a dystopian world dominated by mega corporations, where greed and corruption run rampant.

name: GluMe
summary: “GluMe” is a cute Sokoban-style puzzle game. Team up with your slime friends to collect all the spectacular gems.

name: Glisynth
summary: Glisynth is a rhythm game that uses two types of notes. The Q row on the keyboard is used for yellow notes, while the A row is used for white notes.

name: Glitch
summary: Glitch is an intense and surreal narrative experience, drawn entirely by hand, that will make you question reality with every choice and each of the 26 endings that unlock the special and definitive conclusion!

name: Gladiators of Roma Revixit
summary: Gladiators of Roma Revixit is a unique, story-driven roguelike, set in world in which, after the nuclear fallout, a new Rome and thus a new colosseum rises from the radioactive-ashes. Rise the ranks, enjoy the celebrity of being a Gladiator, and make decisions that impact the story.

name: Glitch Tower
summary: Glitch Tower is a precision 2D roguelike where every step can mutate the rules. Pick a hero, craft wild synergies from corrupted lists, and master fast combat. Bend the glitch, or be consumed. ️ "Time judges. The Tower executes."

name: Gloomy Eyes + Arise: A Simple Story
summary: From shadows to memories, two journeys of the soul.

name: Glitch Karts
summary: A singleplayer racing game available on Glitch Production's merchandise website featuring Pomni from The Amazing Digital Circus, Uzi from Murder Drones, Princess Guinevere from Knights of Guinevere, and Melancholy from The Gaslight District.

name: Gluon
summary: Gluon is a neon-soaked infinite platformer where you dash, build, and survive in a world collapsing into a black hole. Create and share maps, master momentum, slow time, and challenge friends in fast, physics-defying runs.

name: Glide
summary: Explore, puzzle, jump Exploration, Mystery, Puzzles. Become a cat hero and explore an unknown world. Overcome treacherous terrain, discover hidden passages, and solve ancient puzzles to uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows. Will you reach the end of this perilous journey?

name: Glonk
summary: A short incremental game about feeding Glonk! Make Glonk bigger, get more money, and explore the skill tree to upgrade your abilities, and get more Glonks!

name: Glad Tidings
summary:
You are Ulder Ravengard. Your son is completely besotted with his fiancé, but you can’t figure out the appeal.
Surely the only solution is to declare an insane secret war on him before he can ruin the Midwinter's eve ball.

name: Glimmer
summary: Lonely Lit embarks on a journey in search of light to fill the void in his heart.

name: Glass God
summary: GlassGod is a PSX-style roguelite and exploration game where you’re an omnipotent glass god — wield divine powers, manipulate physics, and unleash chaos… but one hit, and you’re shattered to dust, the perfect Glass Cannon.

name: Glue Blocks
summary: Glue your falling blocks to create your own shapes and achieve monster scores in wells of all shapes with dynamic gravity. Compete with friends or have funds in coop. And unleash your own creativity with the mode and well editor!

name: Glyph Chess
summary: Glyph Chess is a strategic board game infused with magical fantasy elements, derived from the Tales of Tarsylia. You will command mages with distinct abilities to escort your Scepter to the central "Source of Magic", or to destroy the enemy's Scepter.

name: Glitchia
summary: GLiTCHiA is an adventure that blends a 2D retro game with a 3D horror space Keep an eye on the door behind you, then use gimmicks and glitches to find what matters as you explore a lost series. Uncover why the ending went wrong, and save the game’s protagonist, Aby.

name: Gloxinia
summary: A rhythm dancing FMV game telling a mysterious story of love, loss, and larceny. Learn choreography and repeat it back to sexy strangers to discover a hidden past.

name: Gloomveil
summary: Explore a vast, interconnected fantasy world with minimal guidance. Observe your surroundings carefully, discover the secrets of the past and try not to draw the attention of something bigger than you…

name: Glitch Hearts
summary: GLITCH HEARTS is a calm erotic puzzle game told from a girl's perspective as she meets other women on a dating site. Play at your pace, chat intimately, explore profiles and unlock hot scenes in a soft, intimate atmosphere.

name: Glitchery
summary: Glitchery is a cooperative multiplayer horror game where players explore an unstable, glitching reality filled with deadly entities. Work together, collect valuable artifacts, and escape before the world turns against you — because one mistake means losing everything.

name: GladiMaker
summary: Optimal stat allocation, creative equipment combos, and tactics that exploit your enemy's weaknesses—your choices define the battlefield! GladiMaker is a whimsical Auto-battler RPG that packs a punch with deep strategy and the thrill of infinite growth.

name: Glimmer
summary: Master the magics of a doomed civilization in this thoughtful puzzler. Figure out how to combine different abilities to reach the wounds that scar the land. Raise a lost island from the depths, and learn the secrets of the people who sank it.
